collection.name: Red Shoes
collection.specialInfo: When females, and only females, wear the shoes, it warrants an attack on people nearby. Psychological and physical attacks occur simultaneously, thus it is difficult to defend against.

observe.record:
->[ {Excerpt from the Hallway Surveillance Footage Z3_493 Employee [Redacted 1] : Is the work over there all done? I finished over there just now. The Little Match Girl is a mess. Ugh, she is so much trouble. Do you want to go to the break room for coffee? Employee [Redacted 2]: Hey, [Redacted 1]. I’ve been thinking… Employee [Redacted 1]: Yeah? Let’s talk in the break room, I’m so tired. Are you wearing heels? We are only allowed to wear work shoes during work hours, remember? Employee [Redacted 2]: [Redacted 1], that’s not what’s important. Look, we are all alone… Employee [Redacted 1]: What are you going on about! Listen, I’m going to go to the break room to rest for a while, alright? Hang on, what are you wearing? Are you, are you wearing THOSE shoes? Employee [Redacted 2] : [Redacted 1], I’ve liked you for a long while now. Employee [Redacted 1] : Oh god, take them off right now. Do you even know what you’re doing? Employee [Redacted 2]: I thought about why you wouldn’t like me. Is it because of Emily? You have no time for me now that you have Emily, is that it? Employee [Redacted 1]: Are you holding an Abnormality regulating device? Please [Redacted 2], take that thing off. Your legs are bleeding. Employee [Redacted 2]: Get Emily out of the picture, that’s what we need. Hang on for a minute, I’ll be back really soon. I promise I won’t take long. Just sit tight until then. Employee [Redacted 1]: Please, think straight, I will stop you. Employee [Redacted 2]: If you want to stop me, you should have done it when I first joined the company.
Employee [Redacted 2] attacked [Redacted 1], leaving him unconscious and headed toward the break room. Thankfully, there were no casualties and ‘Emily’ was safe as well. [Redacted 2]’s information was redacted from company files. She was completely aware of her action. She admitted to the fact that the red shoes only made her more honest about her feelings. When she was overpowered by the Emergency Response Department, the shoes snapped off her ankles and ran away. And exactly 23 minutes later, the creature was captured again and sent to its original confinement zone. [Redacted 2] employee died of a massive hemorrhage. [Redacted 1] received minimal physical harm but the shock caused him to leave the company. } ]
